name: esbuild-plugin-sparkle
description: Bundles sparkle web components as pure (SSR-compatible) functions.

scripts.build-cjs: node ./clean.js dist/cjs && tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs/ && echo {"type": "commonjs"} > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build-mjs: node ./clean.js dist/mjs && tsc --module es2022 --outDir dist/mjs/ && echo {"type": "module"} > dist/mjs/package.json
scripts.build: node ./clean.js dist && npm run build-cjs && npm rum build-mjs
